message: Let's start with a fair share.  I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hope we can find a solution we both like.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 70/30.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's find a middle ground.
I'm not willing to give up too much. I'll offer you 45% and I'll take 55%. It's still a decent split, and we're getting closer to a deal.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55% and you get 45%. This is a fair split, considering inflation.
